00302         template< typename T > struct TRect
00303         {
00304           T left, top, right, bottom;
00305           TRect() {}
00306           TRect( T const & l, T const & t, T const & r, T const & b )
00307             : left( l ), top( t ), right( r ), bottom( b )
00308           {
00309           }
00310           TRect( TRect const & o )
00311             : left( o.left ), top( o.top ), right( o.right ), bottom( o.bottom )
00312           {
00313           }
00314           TRect & operator=( TRect const & o )
00315           {
00316             left = o.left;
00317             top = o.top;
00318             right = o.right;
00319             bottom = o.bottom;
00320             return *this;
00321           }
00322           T width() const
00323           {
00324             return right - left;
00325           }
00326           T height() const
00327           {
00328             return bottom - top;
00329           }
00330         };
00331 
00334         typedef TRect<float> FloatRect;
00335 
00338         typedef TRect< long > Rect;
00339 
00344         struct Box
00345         {
00346             size_t left, top, right, bottom, front, back;
00348             Box()
00349             {
00350             }
00360             Box( size_t l, size_t t, size_t r, size_t b ):
00361                 left(l),
00362                 top(t),   
00363                 right(r),
00364                 bottom(b),
00365                 front(0),
00366                 back(1)
00367             {
00368                 assert(right >= left && bottom >= top && back >= front);
00369             }
00381             Box( size_t l, size_t t, size_t ff, size_t r, size_t b, size_t bb ):
00382                 left(l),
00383                 top(t),   
00384                 right(r),
00385                 bottom(b),
00386                 front(ff),
00387                 back(bb)
00388             {
00389                 assert(right >= left && bottom >= top && back >= front);
00390             }
00391             
00393             bool contains(const Box &def) const
00394             {
00395                 return (def.left >= left && def.top >= top && def.front >= front &&
00396                     def.right <= right && def.bottom <= bottom && def.back <= back);
00397             }
00398             
00400             size_t getWidth() const { return right-left; }
00402             size_t getHeight() const { return bottom-top; }
00404             size_t getDepth() const { return back-front; }
00405         };
